DOC.criteria: Chronic DME patient consider insufficiently responsive available therapy ( laser , antiVEGF ) without intravitreal corticosteroid therapy . Mean central foveal thickness ( central subfield thickness ) ≥ 290 um woman ≥ 305 um men Zeiss Cirrus OR ≥ 305 um woman ≥ 320 um men Heidelberg Spectralis , study eye measure use SDOCT ; 2 .
